author: Trent Stanton
comment: I know there was a recent Moto 360 Android update, which could be causing this issue. But the watchface is moved down quite a bit. It's shifted below the "OK Google" text. So where the top of the watchface is supposed to be, its actually showing improperly down and cutting off the bottom of the watch face.
title: Does Not Display Properly on Moto 360
